trans-unit.source: Using flex: none will create fully inflexible flex items. It is as if you wrote flex: 0 0 auto. The items cannot grow or shrink but will be laid out using flexbox with a flex-basis of auto.

trans-unit.target: 在媒体功能周围使用 not() 会否定查询中的该功能。例如，如果设备没有悬停功能，则 not(hover) 将匹配：

trans-unit.source: Using opacity with a value other than 1 places the element in a new stacking context.
trans-unit.target: 使用 opacity 等于 1 的不透明度将元素放置在新的堆栈上下文中。

trans-unit.source: Using position: fixed also removes the item from flow, however the offsets are based on the viewport rather than the containing block.
trans-unit.target: 使用 position: fixed 也可以从流中删除该项目，但是偏移基于视口而不是包含块。

trans-unit.source: Using z-index appears extremely easy: a single property, assigned a single integer number, with an easy-to-understand behaviour. However, when z-index is applied to complex hierarchies of HTML elements, its behaviour can be hard to understand or predict. This is due to complex stacking rules. In fact a dedicated section has been reserved in the CSS specification CSS-2.1 Appendix E to explain these rules better.
trans-unit.target: 使用 z-index 看起来非常容易：为单个属性分配一个整数，并具有易于理解的行为。但是，将 z-index 应用于HTML元素的复杂层次结构时，其行为可能难以理解或预测。这是由于复杂的堆叠规则。实际上，CSS规范CSS-2.1附录E中已经保留了专门的部分，以更好地解释这些规则。

trans-unit.source: Using a value of auto will display the content with no scrollbars if the content fits inside the box. If it doesn’t fit then scrollbars will be added. Comparing the next example with the example for overflow: scroll you should see overflow scroll has horizontal and vertical scrollbars when it only needs vertical scrolling. The auto example below only adds the scrollbar in the direct we need to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容适合该框，则使用 auto 值将显示内容而没有滚动条。如果不合适，则会添加滚动条。将下一个示例与 overflow: scroll 示例进行比较：滚动时，您只需要在垂直滚动时看到 overflow scroll 具有水平和垂直滚动条即可。下面的 auto 示例仅在我们需要滚动的直接位置添加滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Using a value of justify-content other than normal or stretch will cause column boxes to display at the column-width specified on the multicol container, and the remaining space distributed according to the value of justify-content.
trans-unit.target: 使用除 normal 或 stretch 以外的 justify-content 值将导致列框以multicol容器上指定的 column-width 显示，并且剩余空间根据justify-content的值进行分配。

trans-unit.source: Using a value of scroll contains the content in its box and add scrollbars to enable viewing it. Scrollbars will be added even if the content fits in the box.
trans-unit.target: 使用 scroll 值可在其框中包含内容，并添加滚动条以启用查看功能。即使内容适合框中，也会添加滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Using the flex-direction property with values of row-reverse or column-reverse will create a disconnect between the visual presentation of content and DOM order. This will adversely affect users experiencing low vision navigating with the aid of assistive technology such as a screen reader. If the visual (CSS) order is important, then screen reader users will not have access to the correct reading order.
trans-unit.target: 将 flex-direction 属性与 row-reverse 或 column-reverse 的值一起使用将在内容的可视表示与DOM顺序之间造成断开。借助于屏幕阅读器等辅助技术，这将不利地影响正在经历低视力导航的用户。如果视觉（CSS）顺序很重要，则屏幕阅读器用户将无权访问正确的阅读顺序。

trans-unit.source: Using the order property will create a disconnect between the visual presentation of content and DOM order. This will adversely affect users experiencing low vision navigating with the aid of assistive technology such as a screen reader. If the visual (css) order is important, then screen reader users will not have access to the correct reading order.
trans-unit.target: 使用 order 属性将在内容的可视表示和DOM顺序之间造成脱节。借助于屏幕阅读器等辅助技术，这将不利地影响正在经历低视力导航的用户。如果视觉（css）顺序很重要，则屏幕阅读器用户将无权访问正确的阅读顺序。

If there are four values, they apply to the top, right, bottom, and left, respectively. So, the above rules could also be described as:

trans-unit.source: Visibility values are interpolable between visible and not-visible. One of the start or ending values must therefore be visible or no interpolation can happen. The value is interpolated as a discrete step, where values of the timing function between 0 and 1 map to visible and other values of the timing function (which occur only at the start/end of the transition or as a result of cubic-bezier() functions with y values outside of [0, 1]) map to the closer endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 能见度值之间倍频细可见和不可见的。因此，起始值或结束值之一必须是 visible 否则插值将不会发生。将该值作为离散步进行插值，其中介于 0 和 1 之间的计时函数的值映射到该计时函数的 visible 值和其他值（它们仅在过渡的开始/结束或 cubic-bezier() y值在[0，1]之外的函数）映射到更近的端点。

trans-unit.source: We also wanted to get rid of the standard overscroll effects when the contacts are scrolled to the top or bottom (e.g. Chrome on Android refreshes the page when you scroll past the top boundary). This can be prevented by setting overscroll-behavior: none on the <body> element:
trans-unit.target: 当联系人滚动到顶部或底部时，我们还希望摆脱标准的过度滚动效果（例如，当您滚动到顶部边界之外时，Android上的Chrome会刷新页面）。可以通过设置 overscroll-behavior: none <body> 元素上的none来防止这种情况：

trans-unit.source: We are able to align the content inside grid areas, and the grid tracks themselves on these two axes.
trans-unit.target: 我们能够将网格区域内的内容对齐,网格在这两个轴上自行跟踪。

trans-unit.source: We are going to create a grid with a flexible number of flexible columns. I want them never to become smaller than 200 pixels, and then to share any available remaining space equally – so we always get equal width column tracks. We achieve this with the minmax() function in our repeat notation for track sizing.
trans-unit.target: 我们将创建一个具有灵活数量的灵活列的网格。我希望它们永远不会小于200像素，然后平等地共享任何可用的剩余空间-因此我们总是获得等宽的列轨道。我们通过在重复符号中使用 minmax() 函数来实现此目的，以实现轨道大小调整。

trans-unit.source: We are making use of cross-axis alignment in the most simple flex example. If we add display: flex to a container, the child items all become flex items arranged in a row. They will all stretch to be as tall as the tallest item, as that item is defining the height of the items on the cross axis. If your flex container has a height set, then the items will stretch to that height, regardless of how much content is in the item.
trans-unit.target: 在最简单的flex示例中，我们正在使用横​​轴对齐。如果我们向容器添加 display: flex ，则所有子项都将变成排成一行的flex项。它们都将拉伸成与最高的项目一样高，因为该项目在横轴上定义了项目的高度。如果您的flex容器设置了高度，那么无论项目中有多少内容，项目都会拉伸到该高度。

trans-unit.source: We are once again going to make this a responsive layout, this time however using named lines. Every breakpoint will use a 12-column grid, however the number of tracks that items will span changes depending on the size of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 我们将再次将其打造成一个响应式布局,不过这次使用的是命名线。每一个断点都将使用12列网格,但是项目跨越的轨道数量会根据屏幕的大小而改变。

trans-unit.source: We are working in English, a left-to-right language. Our block-start is the top row line of the grid container, block-end the final row line of the container. Our inline-start is the left-hand column line as inline-start is always the point from which text would be written in the current writing mode, inline-end is the final column line of our grid.
trans-unit.target: 我们的工作语言是英语,从左到右。我们的block-start是网格容器的最上面一行,block-end是容器的最后一行。我们的inline-start是左手边的列行,因为inline-start总是在当前的写作模式下会从这个点开始写文字,inline-end是我们网格的最终列行。

trans-unit.source: We are working with a flex-basis equal to the content size so the available space to distribute is subtracted from the total available space (the width of the flex container), and the leftover space is then shared out equally among each item. Our bigger item ends up bigger because it started from a bigger size, even though it has the same amount of spare space assigned to it as the others:
trans-unit.target: 我们正在使用等于内容大小的 flex-basis ，以便从总可用空间（flex容器的宽度）中减去要分配的可用空间，然后将剩余的空间平均分配给每个项目。我们更大的项目最终会变得更大，因为它是从更大的尺寸开始的，即使它分配的剩余空间与其他项目相同：

trans-unit.source: We call these keywords and properties physical because they relate to the screen you are looking at. Left is always left, no matter what direction your text is running.
trans-unit.target: 我们将这些关键字和属性称为物理属性，因为它们与您正在查看的屏幕相关。无论文本沿什么方向运行，“左”总是左。

trans-unit.source: We can also count backwards from the block and inline end of the grid, for English that would be the right hand column line and final row line. These lines can be addressed as -1, and you can count back from there – so the penultimate line is -2. It is worth noting that the final line is the final line of the explicit grid, the grid defined by grid-template-columns and grid-template-rows, and does not take into account any rows or columns added in the implicit grid outside of that.
trans-unit.target: 我们还可以从网格的块和行内末尾开始倒数，对于英语，这将是右侧的列线和最后的行线。这些行的地址为 -1 ，您可以从那里倒数–因此倒数第二行是 -2 。值得注意的是，最后一行是显式网格的最后一行，显式网格是由 grid-template-columns 和 grid-template-rows 定义的网格，并且不考虑在隐式网格之外添加的任何行或列。那。

trans-unit.source: We can also define an area by giving it a name and then specify the location of that area in the value of the grid-template-areas property. You can choose what you would like to name your area. For example, if I wish to create the layout shown below I can identify four main areas.
trans-unit.target: 我们还可以通过给它命名来定义一个区域，然后在 grid-template-areas 属性的值中指定该区域的位置。您可以选择要命名的区域。例如，如果我要创建如下所示的布局，则可以确定四个主要区域。

trans-unit.source: We can also use values for this property that you may be familiar with from flexbox; the space distribution values of space-between, space-around and space-evenly. If we update align-content to space-between, you can see how the elements on our grid space out:
trans-unit.target: 我们还可以使用您可能在flexbox中熟悉的该属性的值； space-between ， space-around 和 space-evenly 空间的空间分布值。如果 align-content 更新为 space-between ，则可以看到网格上的元素如何间隔：

trans-unit.source: We can control the order in which items stack up by using the z-index property - just like positioned items. If we give box2 a lower z-index than box1 it will display below box1 in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用 z-index 属性来控制项目堆叠的顺序-就像定位的项目一样。如果我们给 box2 的 z-index 值比 box1 低，它将显示在堆栈中 box1 的下方。

trans-unit.source: We can create a similar effect to flexbox, while still keeping the content arranged in strict rows and columns, by creating our track listing using repeat notation and the auto-fill and auto-fit properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用重复符号以及 auto-fill 和 auto-fit 属性来创建曲目列表，我们可以创建与flexbox类似的效果，同时仍将内容按严格的行和列排列。

trans-unit.source: We can see the same thing happening with columns. The container will need to have a height in order that the items will start wrapping and creating new columns, and items will stretch taller to fill each column completely.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以看到同样的事情发生在列上。容器需要有一个高度,这样物品才会开始包裹并创建新的列,物品会被拉伸得更高,以完全填满每个列。

trans-unit.source: We can style text or images in the content property almost any way we want.
trans-unit.target: 我们几乎可以通过任何方式在 content 属性中设置文本或图像的样式。

trans-unit.source: We can take things a step further and define each area with a single property – grid-area. The order of the values for grid-area are as follows.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以更进一步，并使用单个属性（ grid-area 定义每个区域。网格区域的值的顺序如下。

trans-unit.source: We can then redefine that layout inside media queries to go to our two columns layout, and perhaps take it to a three column layout if the available space is even wider. Note that for the wide layout I keep my nine column track grid, I redefine where items are placed using grid-template-areas.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们可以在媒体查询中重新定义该布局，以转到两列布局，如果可用空间更大，则可以将其变为三列布局。请注意，对于宽布局，我保留了九列轨迹网格，我使用 grid-template-areas 重新定义了放置项目的位置。

trans-unit.source: We can then use that framework to layout our page. For example, to create a three column layout with a header and footer, I might have the following markup.
trans-unit.target: 然后,我们可以使用该框架来布局我们的页面。例如,要创建一个带页眉和页脚的三列布局,我可以使用以下标记。

trans-unit.source: We can use line-based placement to control where these items sit on the grid. I would like the first item to start on the far left of the grid and span a single column track. It should also start on the first row line, at the top of the grid and span to the fourth row line.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用基于行的位置来控制这些项目在网格中的位置。我希望第一个项目从网格的最左边开始,跨过一列轨道。它也应该从第一行开始,在网格的顶部,并跨越到第四行。

trans-unit.source: We can use other values to control how the items align:
trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用其他值来控制项目的排列方式。

trans-unit.source: We create a grid container by declaring display: grid or display: inline-grid on an element. As soon as we do this all direct children of that element will become grid items.
trans-unit.target: 我们通过在元素上声明 display: grid 或 display: inline-grid 来创建网格容器。一旦执行此操作，该元素的所有直接子代将变为网格项。

trans-unit.source: We create a simple HTML containing a single <div> element, including an ampersand, that we want to style with a different font. To make it obvious, we will use a sans-serif font, Helvetica, for the text, and a serif font, Times New Roman, for the ampersand.
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了一个简单的HTML，其中包含一个 <div> 元素（包括一个＆符号），我们希望使用其他字体设置样式。为了使其更明显，我们将在文本中使用Sans-serif字体Helvetica，在＆符中使用衬线字体Timess New Roman。

trans-unit.source: We define rows and columns on our grid with the grid-template-columns and grid-template-rows properties. These define grid tracks. A grid track is the space between any two lines on the grid. In the below image you can see a track highlighted – this is the first row track in our grid.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用 grid-template-columns 和 grid-template-rows 属性在网格上定义行和列。这些定义了网格轨迹。甲网格轨道是在网格上的任何两行之间的空间。在下图中，您可以看到一个突出显示的轨道-这是网格中的第一行轨道。

trans-unit.source: We don’t have a justify-items or justify-self property available to us on the main axis as our items are treated as a group on that axis. However it is possible to do some individual alignment in order to separate an item or a group of items from others by using auto margins along with flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 由于主轴上的项目被视为一个组，因此在主轴上没有可用的“ justify-items ”或“ justify-self ”属性。但是，可以通过使用自动边距和flexbox进行一些单独的对齐，以将一个项目或一组项目与其他项目分开。

trans-unit.source: We don’t need to define where our areas are with grid-template-areas as our named lines have created an area for us.
trans-unit.target: 我们不需要使用 grid-template-areas 来定义我们的区域，因为我们的命名线已经为我们创建了一个区域。

trans-unit.source: We encounter physical properties frequently when building websites, and while the grid placement and alignment properties and values respect writing modes, there are things you may want to do with Grid that force you to use physical properties and values. In the guide to Box alignment and grids, I demonstrated how auto margins work in a grid area. Using an auto margin to push one item away from the others is a common flexbox trick too, however this also ties the layout to the physical space.
trans-unit.target: 在构建网站时，我们经常遇到物理属性，尽管网格放置和对齐属性和值遵循书写模式，但是您可能要对Grid进行某些操作，从而迫使您使用物理属性和值。在“ 框对齐和栅格 ”指南中，我演示了自动边距在栅格区域中的工作方式。使用自动边距将一个项目推离另一个项目也是一种常见的flexbox技巧，但是这也将布局与物理空间联系在一起。

trans-unit.source: We first set the color of the <body> to green.
trans-unit.target: 我们首先设置 color 的的 <body> 绿色。

trans-unit.source: We generally think of width and height media queries as being relative the width and height of the browser window. They are actually relative to the viewport, which is the window in the main document, but is the intrinsic size of the element's parent in a nested browsing context like objects, iframes and SVG. In CSS, we also have length units based on the viewport size. A vh unit is 1% of the layout viewport's height. Similarly, vw unit is 1% of layout viewport's width.
trans-unit.target: 通常，我们将宽度和高度媒体查询视为相对于浏览器窗口的宽度和高度。它们实际上是相对于视口的，视口是主文档中的窗口，但是是嵌套的浏览上下文（如对象，iframe和SVG）中元素父级的固有大小。在CSS中，我们还有基于视口大小的长度单位。甲 vh 单元是布局视口的高度的1％。同样， vw 单位是布局视口宽度的1％。

trans-unit.source: We give the image area a grid area name of img and the text area content, then we can lay those out using the grid-template-areas property.
trans-unit.target: 我们给图像区域一个 img 的网格区域名称和一个文本区域的 content ，然后我们可以使用 grid-template-areas 属性进行布局。

trans-unit.source: We got the 800 x 533 measurement when we zoomed in using the keyboard. When we zoomed in with the keyboard, the header and footer stayed flush against the top and bottom of the window. But what if we had pinched-zoomed on a tablet? What if a dynamic keyboard pops open on a phone?
trans-unit.target: 当我们使用键盘放大时,我们得到了800 x 533的测量结果。当我们用键盘放大时,页眉和页脚与窗口的顶部和底部保持齐平。但是,如果我们在平板电脑上进行了捏合缩放呢?如果在手机上弹开动态键盘呢?

trans-unit.source: We have already seen how circle() creates a circular shape. An ellipse() is essentially a squashed circle. If none of these simple shapes do the trick you can create a polygon() and make the shape as complex as you want.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经了解了 circle() 如何创建圆形。一个 ellipse() 基本上是一个压扁的圆。如果没有这些简单的形状可以解决问题，则可以创建一个 polygon() 并根据需要使形状复杂。

trans-unit.source: We have already seen how the fr unit works to assign a proportion of available space in the grid container to our grid tracks. The fr unit, when combined with the minmax() function can give us very similar behavior to the flex properties in flexbox while still enabling the creation of a layout in two dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经了解了 fr 单元如何将网格容器中的一部分可用空间分配给网格轨迹。当与 minmax() 函数结合使用时， fr 单位可以为我们提供与flexbox中的 flex 属性非常相似的行为，同时仍然可以在二维中创建布局。

trans-unit.source: We have completely filled our grid with areas in this example, leaving no white space. However you can leave grid cells empty with this method of layout. To leave a cell empty use the full stop character, '.'. If I want to only display the footer directly under the main content I would need to leave the three cells underneath the sidebar empty.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们用区域完全填充了网格，不留空白。但是，您可以使用这种布局方法将网格单元留空。要将单元格留空，请使用句号' . '。如果我只想直接在主要内容下显示页脚，则需要将侧边栏下方的三个单元格留空。

trans-unit.source: We have negative free space when the natural size of the items adds up to larger than the available space in the flex container. If I have a 500 pixel-wide container like the one above, but the three flex items are each 200 pixels wide, the total space I need will be 600 pixels, so I have 100 pixels of negative free space. This could be removed from the items in order to make them fit the container.
trans-unit.target: 当项目的自然尺寸加起来大于弹性容器的可用空间时,我们就有了负的可用空间。如果我有一个500像素宽的容器,如上图所示,但三个弹性项的宽度各为200像素,我需要的总空间为600像素,所以我有100像素的负自由空间。这可以从项目中删除,以使它们适合容器。

trans-unit.source: We have quite a lot of code here to position each item. It should come as no surprise to know there is a shorthand. The grid-column-start and grid-column-end properties can be combined into grid-column, grid-row-start and grid-row-end into grid-row.
trans-unit.target: 我们这里有很多代码可以放置每个项目。知道有速记不足为奇。可以将 grid-column-start 和 grid-column-end 属性组合为 grid-column ， grid-row-start 和 grid-row-end 组合为 grid-row 。

trans-unit.source: We have seen how named lines create a named area, and this also works in reverse. Named template areas create named lines that you can use to place your items. If we take the layout created in the guide to Grid Template Areas, we can use the lines created by our areas to see how this works.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经看到了命名线是如何创建命名区域的,这也是反过来的。命名的模板区域创建了命名的线条,您可以使用这些线条来放置您的项目。如果我们把在网格模板区域指南中创建的布局,我们可以使用我们的区域创建的线条来看看这是如何工作的。

trans-unit.source: We have typically used floats to create multiple column layouts. If you have floated an item, which is also a grid item in a supporting browser, the float will no longer apply to the item. The fact is that a grid item takes precedence. In the example below, I have a simple media object. In a non-supporting browser, I use float, however I have also defined the container as a grid container, in order to use the alignment properties that are implemented in CSS Grids.
trans-unit.target: 我们通常使用浮点数创建多个列布局。如果浮动了某个项目（在支持的浏览器中也是网格项目），则浮动将不再适用于该项目。事实是，网格项具有优先权。在下面的示例中，我有一个简单的媒体对象。在不支持的浏览器中，我使用 float ，但是我也将容器定义为网格容器，以便使用在CSS Grids中实现的对齐属性。

trans-unit.source: We might want to be able to display our box with the image the other way around. To do this, we redefine the grid to put the 1fr track last, and simply flip the values in grid-template-areas.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能希望能够以其他方式显示带有图像的框。为此，我们重新定义网格以将 1fr 轨道放在最后，然后简单地翻转 grid-template-areas 中的值。

trans-unit.source: We now have the ability to create a grid with a flexible number of flexible tracks, but see items laid out on the grid aligned by rows and columns at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 我们现在能够创建一个具有灵活数量的灵活轨道的网格,但同时看到在网格上按行和列排列的项目。

trans-unit.source: We see this pattern everywhere, used for comments, and anywhere we need to display images and descriptions. With flexbox we can allow the part of the media object containing the image to take its sizing information from the image, and then the body of the media object flexes to take up the remaining space.
trans-unit.target: 我们随处可见这种模式,用于注释,以及任何需要显示图片和描述的地方。通过flexbox,我们可以让包含图片的媒体对象的部分从图片中获取其尺寸信息,然后媒体对象的主体弯曲,以占据剩余的空间。

trans-unit.source: We start mobile first, and all we want for the narrowest screens is for the items to remain in source order, and all span right across the grid.
trans-unit.target: 我们先从移动端入手,对于最窄的屏幕来说,我们希望的是项目保持源码顺序,并且都能直接跨过网格。

trans-unit.source: We start with creating the CSS for the animation. This animation will last for 3 seconds, be called “slidein”, repeat 3 times, and alternate direction each time. In the @keyframes, the width and margin-left are manipulated to make the element slide across the screen.
trans-unit.target: 我们从为动画创建CSS开始。该动画将持续3秒钟，称为“ slidein”，重复3次，并每次改变方向。在 @keyframes 中，对width和left-margin进行操作以使元素在屏幕上滑动。

trans-unit.source: We take a deeper look at creating shapes from images in the Shapes from Images guide.
trans-unit.target: 在“图像中的形状”指南中，我们将更深入地研究如何从图像中创建形状。

trans-unit.source: We will also discover how auto margins can be used for alignment in flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 我们还将发现如何在flexbox中使用自动边距进行对齐。

trans-unit.source: We will be exploring line based placement in full detail in a later article. The following example demonstrates doing this in a simple way. When placing an item, we target the line – rather than the track.
trans-unit.target: 在后面的文章中，我们将详细探讨基于行的放置。下面的示例演示了一种简单的方法。放置物品时，我们将目标对准线而不是轨道。

trans-unit.source: We will revisit the other functionality offered by this shorthand later in these guides when we take a look at auto placement and the grid-auto-flow property.
trans-unit.target: 我们将在稍后的这些指南中重新审视这个速记提供的其他功能,当我们查看自动放置和网格-自动流属性时。

trans-unit.source: We will take a brief look at these properties in this overview, and you can gain a fuller understanding in the guide Controlling Ratios of Flex Items on the Main Axis.
trans-unit.target: 在本概述中，我们将简要介绍这些属性，您可以在控制主轴上的弹性项目的比率指南中获得更全面的了解。

trans-unit.source: We would like to provide finer grained control (than just auto and none) in HTML for which parts of an element will cause it to "catch" mouse events, and when. To help us in deciding how pointer-events should be further extended for HTML, if you have any particular things that you would like to be able to do with this property, then please add them to the Use Cases section of this wiki page (don't worry about keeping it tidy).
trans-unit.target: 我们希望在HTML中提供更细粒度的控件（不仅仅是 auto 和 none ），因为元素的哪些部分会导致元素“捕获”鼠标事件以及何时触发。为了帮助我们确定如何进一步扩展HTML的 pointer-events ，如果您希望对此属性进行任何特殊处理，请将其添加到此Wiki页面的“用例”部分（不要不必担心保持整洁）。

trans-unit.source: We’ll use JavaScript code to listen for all three possible animation events. This code configures our event listeners; we call it when the document is first loaded in order to set things up.
trans-unit.target: 我们将使用JavaScript代码来侦听所有三个可能的动画事件。这段代码配置了我们的事件监听器。我们在首次加载文档时将其命名以进行设置。

trans-unit.source: We’ve already seen in these guides that grid gives us power to re-order the content of our page in various ways. We can use the order property, which will change how items auto-place. We can use grid-auto-flow: dense which will take items visually out of DOM order. We can also position items using line-based placement of grid template areas, without considering their location in the source.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经在这些指南中看到，网格使我们能够以各种方式对页面内容进行重新排序。我们可以使用 order 属性，它将更改项目的自动放置方式。我们可以使用 grid-auto-flow: dense ，它将使项目在视觉上脱离DOM顺序。我们还可以使用基于行的网格模板区域放置来定位项目，而无需考虑它们在源中的位置。

trans-unit.source: We'll apply it to this HTML:
trans-unit.target: 我们将把它应用到这个HTML中。

trans-unit.source: We'll modify the sliding text example to output some information about each animation event when it occurs, so we can get a look at how they work.
trans-unit.target: 我们将修改滑动文本示例,当每个动画事件发生时,输出一些信息,这样我们就可以了解它们的工作原理。

trans-unit.source: WebKit-based browsers originally implemented an older draft of CSS3 background-size in which an omitted second value is treated as duplicating the first value; this draft does not include the contain or cover keywords.
trans-unit.target: 基于WebKit的浏览器最初实现了CSS3 background-size 的较早草案，其中忽略的第二个值被视为与第一个值重复；本草稿不包含 contain 或 cover 关键字。

trans-unit.source: Webkit also supports the prefixed version of this property, and in that case, in addition to the current keywords, the alternative synonyms are: padding, border, and content.
trans-unit.target: Webkit还支持此属性的前缀版本，在这种情况下，除了当前的关键字之外，其他同义词还包括： padding ， border 和 content 。

trans-unit.source: Weight
trans-unit.target: Weight

trans-unit.source: Weight (represented by the wght tag) defines the design axis of how thin or thick (light or heavy, in typical typographic terms) the strokes of the letterforms can be. For a long time in CSS there has existed the ability to specify this via the font-weight property, which takes numeric values ranging from 100 to 900 in increments of 100, and keywords like normal or bold, which are were simply aliases for their corresponding numeric values (400 and 700 in this case). These are still applied when dealing with non-variable or variable fonts, but with variable ones, any number from 1 to 1000 is now valid.
trans-unit.target: 重量（由 wght 标签表示）定义了字母形状的笔划可以多薄或多厚（在典型的印刷术语中为轻或重）的设计轴。长期以来，CSS中一直存在通过 font-weight 属性指定此功能的能力，该属性接受从100到900的数字值（以100为增量）以及诸如 normal 或 bold 之类的关键字，它们只是其对应名称的别名数值（在这种情况下为400和700）。在处理非可变或可变字体时，这些变量仍然适用，但是对于可变字体，从1到1000的任何数字现在都有效。

trans-unit.source: What is worth noting is that the margin-box will clip the shape, therefore shapes created in reference to other shapes which extend past the margin box will have the shape clipped to the margin box. We will see this in the following examples of basic shapes.
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是， margin-box 将剪切形状，因此，参照其他形状延伸超出边距框的形状创建的形状将被剪切到边距框。我们将在以下基本形状示例中看到这一点。

trans-unit.source: What it looks like
trans-unit.target: 它看起来像什么

trans-unit.source: What really matters here is the class "moved"; let's take a look at what it does. First, the perspective() function positions the viewer relative to the plane that lies where z=0 (in essence, the surface of the screen). A value of 500px means the user is 500 pixels "in front of" the imagery located at z=0.
trans-unit.target: 这里真正重要的是“感动”的阶级。让我们看看它的作用。首先， perspective() 函数将查看器相对于z = 0所在的平面（实质上是屏幕表面）定位。 500px 的值表示用户位于位于z = 0的图像“前面”的500个像素。

trans-unit.source: What sets the base size of the item?
trans-unit.target: 项目的基本尺寸是怎么设定的?

trans-unit.source: What this demonstrates, is that if you are switching the direction of your text, either for entire pages or for parts of pages, and are using lines: you may want to name your lines, if you do not want the layout to completely switch direction. For some things, for example, where a grid contains text content, this switching may be exactly what you want. For other usage it may not.
trans-unit.target: 这表明,如果你要切换文本的方向,无论是整个页面还是页面的一部分,并且使用线条:如果你不希望布局完全切换方向,你可能需要为你的线条命名。对于某些事情,例如,在一个网格包含文本内容的地方,这种切换可能正是你想要的。对于其他用途来说,可能就不是了。

trans-unit.source: What we are doing here when defining all four lines, is defining the area by specifying the lines that enclose that area.
trans-unit.target: 我们在这里定义这四条线的时候,是通过指定包围这个区域的线来定义区域。

trans-unit.source: When calc() is used for controlling text size, be sure that one of the values includes a relative length unit, for example:
trans-unit.target: 使用 calc() 控制文本大小时，请确保其中一个值包含相对长度单位，例如：

trans-unit.source: When grid-column-end is omitted, if grid-column-start is a <custom-ident>, grid-column-end is set to that <custom-ident>; otherwise, it is set to auto.
trans-unit.target: 当省略 grid-column-end 时，如果 grid-column-start 是 <custom-ident> ，则 grid-column-end 设置为该 <custom-ident> ；否则，将其设置为 auto 。

trans-unit.source: When grid-column-start is omitted, if grid-row-start is a <custom-ident>, all four longhands are set to that value. Otherwise, it is set to auto.
trans-unit.target: 当省略 grid-column-start 时，如果 grid-row-start 是 <custom-ident> ，则所有四个正手设置为该值。否则，将其设置为 auto 。

trans-unit.source: When grid-row-end is omitted, if grid-row-start is a <custom-ident>, grid-row-end is set to that <custom-ident>; otherwise, it is set to auto.
trans-unit.target: 当省略 grid-row-end 时，如果 grid-row-start 是 <custom-ident> ，则将 grid-row-end 设置为该 <custom-ident> ；否则，将其设置为 auto 。

trans-unit.target: 当指定 lighter 或 bolder ，下表显示如何确定元素的绝对字体粗细：

trans-unit.source: When min() is used for controlling text size, make sure the text is always large enough to read. A suggestion is to use the min() function nested within a max() that has as its second value a relative length unit that is always large enough to read. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当 min() 用于控制文本大小时，请确保文本始终足够大以供阅读。建议使用嵌套在 max() 中的min（）函数，该函数的第二个值是相对长度单位，该长度始终足够大以至于可以读取。例如：

trans-unit.source: When position is set to absolute or fixed, the bottom property specifies the distance between the element's bottom edge and the bottom edge of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 absolute 或 fixed 时， bottom 属性指定元素的底边与其包含块的底边之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to absolute or fixed, the left property specifies the distance between the element's left edge and the left edge of its containing block. (The containing block is the ancestor to which the element is relatively positioned.)
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 absolute 或 fixed 时， left 属性指定元素的左边缘与其包含块的左边缘之间的距离。（包含块是元素相对定位到的祖先。）

trans-unit.source: When position is set to absolute or fixed, the right property specifies the distance between the element's right edge and the right edge of its containing block.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 absolute 或 fixed 时， right 属性指定元素的右边缘与其包含块的右边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to absolute or fixed, the top property specifies the distance between the element's top edge and the top edge of its containing block. (Containing block needs to have property position: relative)
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 absolute 或 fixed 时， top 属性指定元素的顶部边缘与其包含块的顶部边缘之间的距离。（包含块需要具有属性 position: relative ）

trans-unit.source: When position is set to relative, the bottom property specifies the distance the element's bottom edge is moved above its normal position.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 relative 时， bottom 属性指定元素的底边在其正常位置上方移动的距离。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to relative, the left property specifies the distance the element's left edge is moved to the right from its normal position.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 relative 时， left 属性指定元素的左边缘从其正常位置向右移动的距离。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to relative, the right property specifies the distance the element's right edge is moved to the left from its normal position.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 relative 时， right 属性指定元素的右边缘从其正常位置向左移动的距离。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to relative, the top property specifies the distance the element's top edge is moved below its normal position.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 relative 时， top 属性指定元素的上边缘在其正常位置以下移动的距离。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to static, the bottom property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 static 时， bottom 属性无效。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to static, the left property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 static 时， left 属性无效。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to static, the right property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 static 时， right 属性无效。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to static, the top property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 static 时， top 属性无效。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to sticky, the bottom property behaves like its position is relative when the element is inside the viewport, and like its position is fixed when it is outside.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 sticky 时， bottom 属性的行为就像当元素在视口内部时其 position 是 relative 的，而在其外部时则其 position 是 fixed 。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to sticky, the left property behaves like its position is relative when the element is inside the viewport, and like its position is fixed when it is outside.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 sticky 时， left 属性的行为类似于元素在视口内部时其 position 是 relative 当元素位于视口外部时则其 position 是 fixed 。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to sticky, the right property behaves like its position is relative when the element is inside the viewport, and like its position is fixed when it is outside.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 sticky 时， right 属性的行为就像当元素在视口内部时其 position 是 relative ，而在元素位于视口外部时则其 position 是 fixed 。

trans-unit.source: When position is set to sticky, the top property behaves like its position is relative when the element is inside the viewport, and like its position is fixed when it is outside.
trans-unit.target: 当 position 设置为 sticky 时， top 属性的行为类似于元素在视口内部时其 position 是 relative 的，并且就像其 position 在外部时是 fixed 。

trans-unit.source: When four positions are specified, they create slices measured from the top, right, bottom, and left in that order (clockwise).
trans-unit.target: 当指定了四个位置时，它们创建从上，右，下和左按该顺序（顺时针）测量的切片。

trans-unit.source: When four values are specified, the colors apply to the top, right, bottom, and left in that order (clockwise).
trans-unit.target: 当4个指定值，颜色适用于顶部，右，底部和左侧的顺序（顺时针方向）这一点。

trans-unit.source: When four values are specified, the margins apply to the top, right, bottom, and left in that order (clockwise).
trans-unit.target: 当指定了四个值时，边距将按该顺序（顺时针）应用于top，right，bottom和left。

trans-unit.source: When four values are specified, the outsets apply to the top, right, bottom, and left in that order (clockwise).
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了四个值，则开始位置将按该顺序（顺时针）应用于top，right，bottom和left。

trans-unit.source: When four values are specified, the paddings apply to the top, right, bottom, and left in that order (clockwise).
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了四个值，则填充将按该顺序（顺时针）应用于top，right，bottom和left。

trans-unit.source: When four values are specified, the styles apply to the top, right, bottom, and left in that order (clockwise).
trans-unit.target: 当4个指定值，样式应用到顶部，右，底部和左侧的顺序（顺时针方向）这一点。

trans-unit.source: When four values are specified, the widths apply to the top, right, bottom, and left in that order (clockwise).
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了四个值，则宽度按该顺序（顺时针）应用于top，right，bottom和left。

trans-unit.source: When one position is specified, it creates all four slices at the same distance from their respective sides.
trans-unit.target: 当一个被指定的位置，它在从它们各自的两侧是相同的距离创建所有四片。

trans-unit.source: When one value is specified, it applies the same behavior on all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 当一个指定的值，它适用于同一行为四面。

trans-unit.source: When one value is specified, it applies the same color to all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 当一个指定的值，它适用相同的颜色，以四面。

trans-unit.source: When one value is specified, it applies the same margin to all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 当一个指定的值，它适用同样的保证金四面。

trans-unit.source: When one value is specified, it applies the same outset to all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 当一个指定的值，它适用同样的一开始就四面。

trans-unit.source: When one value is specified, it applies the same padding to all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 当一个指定的值，它适用同样的填充，以四面。

trans-unit.source: When one value is specified, it applies the same style to all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 当一个指定的值，它适用同样的风格，四面。

trans-unit.source: When one value is specified, it applies the same width to all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 当一个指定的值，它适用相同的宽度，以四面。

trans-unit.source: When one<length> value is specified, it defines both the horizontal and vertical spacings between cells.
trans-unit.target: 当一个 <length> 指定的值，它定义两个小区之间的水平和垂直间隔。

trans-unit.source: When three positions are specified, the first value creates a slice measured from the top, the second creates slices measured from the left and right, the third creates a slice measured from the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 当3点被指定的位置，所述第一值创建一个从测量的切片顶部，所述第二创建从所测量的片左右，第三创建从所述测得的切片底部。

trans-unit.source: When three values are specified, the first color applies to the top, the second to the left and right, the third to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 当3个被指定的值，所述第一颜色适用于顶部，第二至左边和右边，第三至底部。

trans-unit.source: When three values are specified, the first margin applies to the top, the second to the left and right, the third to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 当3个被指定的值时，第一余量适用于顶部，第二至左边和右边，第三至底部。

trans-unit.source: When three values are specified, the first outset applies to the top, the second to the left and right, the third to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 当指定了三个值时，第一个起始值适用于顶部，第二个起始值适用于左侧和右侧，第三个起始值适用于底部。

trans-unit.source: When three values are specified, the first padding applies to the top, the second to the left and right, the third to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 当3个被指定的值，所述第一填充适用于顶部，第二至左边和右边，第三至底部。

trans-unit.source: When three values are specified, the first style applies to the top, the second to the left and right, the third to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了三个值，则第一种样式将应用于顶部，第二种样式将应用于左侧和右侧，第三个样式将应用于底部。

trans-unit.source: When three values are specified, the first width applies to the top, the second to the left and right, the third to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 当3个被指定的值，所述第一宽度适用于顶部，第二至左边和右边，第三至底部。

trans-unit.source: When two positions are specified, the first value creates slices measured from the top and bottom, the second creates slices measured from the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 当2点被指定的位置，所述第一值创建一个从测量的层的顶部和底部，所述第二创建从所测量的片左右。

trans-unit.source: When two values are specified, the first applies to the top and bottom, the second to the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 当2个指定值时，所述第一应用到所述顶部和底部，所述第二至左边和右边。

trans-unit.source: When two values are specified, the first color applies to the top and bottom, the second to the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 当2个指定值时，所述第一颜色适用于顶部和底部，所述第二至左边和右边。

trans-unit.source: When two values are specified, the first margin applies to the top and bottom, the second to the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 当2个指定值时，第一余量适用于顶部和底部，所述第二至左边和右边。

trans-unit.source: When two values are specified, the first outset applies to the top and bottom, the second to the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 当指定两个值时，第一个起始值适用于顶部和底部，第二个起始值适用于左侧和右侧。

trans-unit.source: When two values are specified, the first padding applies to the top and bottom, the second to the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 当2倍指定的值，所述第一填充适用于顶部和底部，所述第二至左边和右边。

trans-unit.source: When two values are specified, the first style applies to the top and bottom, the second to the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 当2个指定值时，第一个样式应用到顶部和底部，第二至左，右。

trans-unit.source: When two values are specified, the first width applies to the top and bottom, the second to the left and right.
trans-unit.target: 当2倍指定的值，所述第一宽度适用于顶部和底部，所述第二至左边和右边。

trans-unit.source: When two<length> values are specified, the first value defines the horizontal spacing between cells (i.e., the space between cells in adjacent columns), and the second value defines the vertical spacing between cells (i.e., the space between cells in adjacent rows).
trans-unit.target: 当指定两个 <length> 值时，第一个值定义单元格之间的水平间距（即，相邻列中的单元格之间的空间），第二个值定义单元格之间的垂直间距（即，相邻行中的单元格之间的空间））。

trans-unit.source: When a URL points at a specific piece of a document, it can be difficult for the user to notice. Find out how you can use some simple CSS to draw attention to the target of a URL and improve the user's experience.
trans-unit.target: 当一个URL指向文档中的某个特定片段时,用户可能很难注意到。了解如何使用一些简单的CSS来吸引用户对URL目标的注意,并改善用户的体验。

trans-unit.source: When a coordinate value is outside the [-1, 1] range, the element grows along that dimension; when inside, it shrinks. If it is negative, the result a point reflection in that dimension. A value of 1 has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 当坐标值超出[-1，1]范围时，元素沿该尺寸增长；在里面时，它会收缩。如果为负，则结果在该维度上为点反射。值为1无效。

trans-unit.source: When a dimension is specified, rule 1 applies that dimension from the SVG to the rendered background unless specifically overridden by the CSS. When an intrinsic ratio is also specified, that's used to determine the other dimension.
trans-unit.target: 当指定了一个维度时,规则1会将SVG中的那个维度应用到渲染的背景中,除非被CSS特别覆盖。如果还指定了一个内在比率,则用于确定其他维度。

trans-unit.source: When a gesture is started, the browser intersects the touch-action values of the touched element and all its ancestors up to the one that implements the gesture (in other words, the first containing scrolling element). This means that in practice, touch-action is typically applied only to individual elements which have some custom behavior, without needing to specify touch-action explicitly on any of that element's descendants. After a gesture has started, changes to touch-action values will not have any impact on the behavior of the current gesture.
trans-unit.target: 当手势开始时，浏览器将被触摸元素及其所有祖先的 touch-action 值相交，直到实现该手势的元素（换句话说，第一个包含滚动元素）。这意味着实际上， touch-action 通常仅应用于具有某些自定义行为的单个元素，而无需在该元素的任何后代中明确指定 touch-action 。手势开始后，更改触摸动作值将不会对当前手势的行为产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: When a given font includes capital letter glyphs of multiple different sizes, this property selects the most appropriate ones. If petite capital glyphs are not available, they are rendered using small capital glyphs. If these are not present, the browser synthesizes them from the uppercase glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 当给定字体包括多个不同大小的大写字母字形时,该属性会选择最合适的字形。如果没有小写字母字形,则使用小写字母字形呈现。如果这些字形不存在,浏览器会从大写字母字形中合成它们。

trans-unit.source: When a keyframe is defined multiple times
trans-unit.target: 当一个关键帧被多次定义时

trans-unit.source: When a nested box is assigned a different writing mode to its parent, then an inline level box will display as if it has display: inline-block.
trans-unit.target: 当嵌套框为其父级分配了不同的书写模式时，内联级别框将显示为好像具有 display: inline-block 。

trans-unit.source: When a non-autoflex-basis is specified, Internet Explorer 10 and 11 always uses a content-box box model to calculate the size of a flex item, even if box-sizing: border-box is applied to the element. See Flexbug #7 for more info.
trans-unit.target: 当指定了非 auto flex-basis ，即使将 box-sizing: border-box 应用于元素，Internet Explorer 10和11也会始终使用 content-box 框框模型来计算伸缩项的大小。有关更多信息，请参见Flexbug＃7。

trans-unit.source: When a spanner is introduced, it breaks the flow of columns and columns restart after the spanner, effectively creating a new set of column boxes. The content does not jump over a spanning element.
trans-unit.target: 当引入一个跨接元素时,它打破了列的流动,列在跨接元素后重新开始,实际上是建立了一组新的列框。内容不会跳过跨栏元素。

trans-unit.source: When a target is touched and held on iOS, Safari displays a callout information about the link. This property allows disabling that behavior.
trans-unit.target: 当在iOS上触摸并按住目标时,Safari会显示链接的callout信息。此属性允许禁用该行为。

trans-unit.source: When a user agent (such as your browser) lays out a document, it generates a box for every element. Each box is divided into four areas:
trans-unit.target: 当用户代理(比如你的浏览器)排版文档时,它会为每个元素生成一个方框。每个方框分为四个区域。

trans-unit.source: When a user pans or scrolls and then lifts his or her contact (for instance, a finger), the content can continue to move with inertia. Snap-points can change the animation that runs when the user lifts his or her finger so that you can adjust where the content will stop. By placing snap-points, you can make it easy for your users to manipulate your content and make it stop at convenient or key places.
trans-unit.target: 当用户平移或滚动,然后抬起他或她的接触点(例如手指)时,内容可以随着惯性继续移动。卡点可以改变用户抬起手指时运行的动画,这样你就可以调整内容的停止位置。通过放置快照点,你可以让你的用户很容易地操作你的内容,并使其在方便或关键的地方停止。

trans-unit.source: When aligning items on the block axis you will use the properties that begin align-:
trans-unit.target: 在块轴上对齐项目时，将使用以 align- 开头的属性：

trans-unit.source: When aligning items on the inline axis you will use the properties which begin with justify-:
trans-unit.target: 当对齐内联轴上的项目时，将使用以 justify- 开头的属性：

trans-unit.source: When all margins are negative, the size of the collapsed margin is the smallest (most negative) margin. This applies to both adjacent elements and nested elements.
trans-unit.target: 当所有的边距都是负数时,折叠边距的大小是最小的(最负数)边距。这适用于相邻元素和嵌套元素。

trans-unit.source: When all of the first four arguments are supplied they represent the top, right, bottom and left offsets from the reference box inward that define the positions of the edges of the inset rectangle. These arguments follow the syntax of the margin shorthand, that let you set all four insets with one, two or four values.
trans-unit.target: 当前四个参数都被提供时,它们代表了从参考框向内的上、右、下、左的偏移量,这些偏移量定义了镶边矩形边缘的位置。这些参数遵循 margin shorthand 的语法,让你用一个、两个或四个值来设置所有四个镶边。

trans-unit.source: When altering the indentation of lists, make sure to set both the padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 在改变列表的缩进时,一定要同时设置padding和margin。

trans-unit.source: When an important rule is used on a style declaration, this declaration overrides any other declarations. Although technically !important has nothing to do with specificity, it interacts directly with it. Using !important, however, is bad practice and should be avoided because it makes debugging more difficult by breaking the natural cascading in your stylesheets. When two conflicting declarations with the !important rule are applied to the same element, the declaration with a greater specificity will be applied.
trans-unit.target: 在样式声明上使用 important 规则时，此声明将覆盖其他任何声明。尽管从技术上讲， !important 与特异性无关，但它直接与它相互作用。但是，使用 !important, 是不好的做法，应避免使用它，因为它会破坏样式表中的自然级联，从而使调试更加困难。当两个具有 !important 规则的冲突声明应用于同一元素时，将应用具有更大特异性的声明。

trans-unit.source: When an element has a border that is larger than a single CSS pixel, each line of pixels uses the next color specified in this property, from the outside in. This eliminates the need for nested boxes. If the border is wider than the number of specified colors, the remaining part of the border is the innermost color specified.
trans-unit.target: 当一个元素的边框大于一个CSS像素时,每一行像素都会使用此属性中指定的下一个颜色,从外到内。这样就不需要嵌套框了。如果边框的宽度超过了指定的颜色数量,那么边框的剩余部分就是指定的最里面的颜色。

trans-unit.source: When an element has a parent set to display: grid it is blockified, as defined in the CSS display specification. In the case of our item set to inline-block, this is why display: inline-block no longer applied.
trans-unit.target: 当元素的父级集 display: grid 时，将按照CSS display规范中的定义对其进行阻止。在我们的项目设置为 inline-block 的情况下，这就是为什么 display: inline-block 不再适用。

trans-unit.source: When an intrinsic ratio is specified, but no dimensions, rule 4 is applied -- except that rule 2 also applies. The image is therefore rendered just like for the contain case.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了固有比率，但未指定尺寸，则将应用规则4 －除了规则2也适用。因此，就像 contain 容器一样，渲染图像。

trans-unit.source: When animated, a point's abscissa and ordinate values are interpolated independently. However, because the speed of the interpolation is determined by a single timing function for both coordinates, the point will move in a straight line.
trans-unit.target: 设置动画时，将独立插入点的横坐标和纵坐标值。但是，由于插值的速度由两个坐标的单个定时函数确定，因此该点将沿直线移动。

trans-unit.source: When animated, values of the <integer> data type are interpolated using discrete, whole steps. The calculation is done as if they were real, floating-point numbers; the discrete value is obtained using the floor function. The speed of the interpolation is determined by the timing function associated with the animation.
trans-unit.target: 设置为动画后，将使用不连续的完整步骤对 <integer> 数据类型的值进行插值。就像它们是真实的浮点数一样进行计算；使用底函数获得离散值。插值的速度由与动画关联的计时功能确定。

trans-unit.source: When animated, values of the <length> data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers. The interpolation happens on the calculated value. The speed of the interpolation is determined by the timing function associated with the animation.
trans-unit.target: 设置为动画时，会将 <length> 数据类型的值作为真实的浮点数进行插值。插值发生在计算值上。插值的速度由与动画关联的计时功能确定。

trans-unit.source: When animated, values of the <number> CSS data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers. The speed of the interpolation is determined by the timing function associated with the animation.
trans-unit.target: 设置为动画时，会将 <number> CSS数据类型的值插入为真实的浮点数。插值的速度由与动画关联的计时功能确定。

trans-unit.source: When animated, values of the <percentage> data type are interpolated as real, floating-point numbers. The speed of the interpolation is determined by the timing function associated with the animation.
trans-unit.target: 设置为动画时，会将 <percentage> 数据类型的值作为真实的浮点数进行插值。插值的速度由与动画关联的计时功能确定。

trans-unit.source: When animated, values of the <shape> data type are interpolated over their top, right, bottom, and left components, each treated as a real, floating-point number. The speed of the interpolation is determined by the timing function associated with the animation.
trans-unit.target: 设置为动画时， <shape> 数据类型的值将插值在其 top ， right ， bottom 和 left 分量上，每个分量均被视为一个实浮点数。插值的速度由与动画关联的计时功能确定。

trans-unit.source: When animating between one <basic-shape> and a second, the rules below are applied. The values in the shape functions interpolate as a simple list. The list values interpolate as <length>, <percentage>, or calc() where possible. If list values are not one of those types but are identical (such as finding nonzero in the same list position in both lists), those values do interpolate.
trans-unit.target: 在一个 <basic-shape> 和一秒钟之间进行动画时，将应用以下规则。形状函数中的值作为简单列表插入。列表值在可能的情况下以 <length> ， <percentage> 或 calc() 进行插值。如果列表值不是这些类型之一，而是相同的（例如，在两个列表的相同列表位置中找到 nonzero 值），则这些值会进行插值。

trans-unit.source: When animating between one <basic-shape> and another, the rules below are applied. The values in the shape functions interpolate as a simple list. The list values interpolate as <length>, <percentage>, or calc() where possible. If list values are not one of those types but are identical (such as finding nonzero in the same list position in both lists), those values do interpolate.
trans-unit.target: 在一个 <basic-shape> 和另一个<basic-shape>之间进行动画设置时，将应用以下规则。形状函数中的值作为简单列表插入。列表值在可能的情况下以 <length> ， <percentage> 或 calc() 进行插值。如果列表值不是这些类型之一，而是相同的（例如，在两个列表的相同列表位置中找到 nonzero 值），则这些值会进行插值。

trans-unit.source: When appearing outside a minmax() notation, it implies an automatic minimum (i.e. minmax(auto, <flex>)).
trans-unit.target: 当出现在 minmax() 表示法之外时，表示自动最小值（即 minmax(auto, <flex>) ）。

trans-unit.source: When applied to a table cell, specifies the alignment character around which the cell's contents will align.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于表格单元格时,指定单元格的内容将围绕其对齐的对齐字符。

trans-unit.source: When applied to non-floating blocks, it moves the border edge of the element down until it is below the margin edge of all relevant floats. The non-floated block's vertical margin collapses.
trans-unit.target: 当应用于非浮动块时，它将元素的边界边缘向下移动，直到其位于所有相关浮动对象的边缘边缘以下。非浮动块的垂直边距折叠。

trans-unit.source: When both left and right are defined, the position of the element is overspecified. When this is the case, the left value has precedence when the container is left-to-right (thus, the computed value of right is set to -left); the right value has precedence when the container is right-to-left (thus, the computed value of left is set to -right).
trans-unit.target: 如果同时定义了 left 和 right ，则元素的位置会被过度指定。当在这种情况下， left 值具有当容器被左到右（因此，的计算值优先 right 设定为 -left ）; 的 right 值具有优先级时，所述容器是从右到左（因此，的计算值 left 被设置为 -right ）。

trans-unit.source: When both top and bottom are specified, andheight is unspecified or either auto or 100%, both the top and bottom distances are respected. In all other situations, if height is constrained in any way, the top property takes precedence and the bottom property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时指定了 top 和 bottom ，并且 height 未指定，或者为 auto 或 100% ，则将同时考虑到 top 和 bottom 的距离。在所有其他情况下，如果以任何方式限制 height ，则 top 属性优先，而 bottom 属性则被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When both left and right are defined, the position of the element is overspecified. When this is the case, the left value has precedence when the container is left-to-right (thus, the computed value of right is set to -left); the right value has precedence when the container is right-to-left (thus, the computed value of left is set to -right).
trans-unit.target: 如果同时定义了 left 和 right ，则元素的位置会被过度指定。当在这种情况下， left 值具有当容器被左到右（因此，的计算值优先 right 设定为 -left ）;的 right 值具有优先级时，所述容器是从右到左（因此，的计算值 left 被设置为 -right ）。

trans-unit.source: When both top and bottom are specified, andheight is unspecified or either auto or 100%, both the top and bottom distances are respected. In all other situations, if height is constrained in any way, the top property takes precedence and the bottom property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时指定了 top 和 bottom ，并且 height 未指定，或者为 auto 或 100% ，则将同时考虑到 top 和 bottom 的距离。在所有其他情况下，如果以任何方式限制 height ，则 top 属性优先，而 bottom 属性则被忽略。

trans-unit.source: When can I use SVG Fonts?
trans-unit.target: 什么时候可以使用SVG字体?

trans-unit.source: When can I use WOFF?
trans-unit.target: 什么时候可以使用WOFF?

trans-unit.source: When cells are collapsed, the border-style value of inset behaves like groove, and outset behaves like ridge.
trans-unit.target: 当单元折叠时， inset 的 border-style 值的行为类似于 groove ，而 outset 的行为类似于 ridge 。

trans-unit.source: When cells are separated, the distance between cells is defined by the border-spacing property.
trans-unit.target: 分隔单元格时，单元格之间的距离由 border-spacing 属性定义。

trans-unit.source: When creating a shape, the reference box is defined by each property that uses <basic-shape> values. The coordinate system for the shape has its origin at the top-left corner of the reference box, with the x-axis running to the right and the y-axis running downwards. All the lengths expressed in percentages are resolved from the used dimensions of the reference box.
trans-unit.target: 创建形状时，参考框由使用 <basic-shape> 值的每个属性定义。形状的坐标系的原点位于参考框的左上角，x轴向右，y轴向下。所有以百分比表示的长度都从参考框的使用尺寸中解析出来。

trans-unit.source: When creating our example grid we specifically defined our column tracks with the grid-template-columns property, but the grid also created rows on its own. These rows are part of the implicit grid. Whereas the explicit grid consists of any rows and columns defined with grid-template-columns or grid-template-rows.
trans-unit.target: 在创建示例网格时，我们使用 grid-template-columns 属性专门定义了列轨迹，但是网格也自行创建了行。这些行是隐式网格的一部分。而显式网格由使用 grid-template-columns 或 grid-template-rows 定义的任何行和列组成。

trans-unit.source: When dealing with multiple-line flex containers however you need to understand that the wrapping is re-done after collapsing. So the browser needs to re-do the wrapping behaviour to account for the new space that the collapsed item has left in the inline direction.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在处理多行flex容器时，您需要了解折叠后要重新包装。因此，浏览器需要重新执行包装行为，以解决折叠项在嵌入式方向上留下的新空间。

trans-unit.source: When defining custom counter styles, the negative descriptor lets you alter the representations of negative counter values, by providing a way to specify symbols to be appended or prepended to the counter representation when the value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 定义自定义计数器样式时，使用 negative 描述符可以通过提供一种方法来指定负计数器值的表示形式，该方法可以指定负值时要在计数器表示形式之后附加或添加的符号。

trans-unit.source: When defining custom counter styles, the range descriptor lets the author specify a range of counter values over which the style is applied. If a counter value is outside the specified range, then the fallback style will be used to construct the representation of that marker. Value of the range descriptor can be either auto or a comma separated list of lower and upper bounds specified as integers.
trans-unit.target: 在定义自定义计数器样式时， range 描述符使作者可以指定在其上应用样式的计数器值范围。如果计数器值超出指定范围，则将使用后备样式来构造该标记的表示形式。范围描述符的值可以是自动的，也可以是用逗号分隔的以整数形式指定的上下限列表。

trans-unit.source: When defining the grid, I name my lines inside square brackets. Those names can be anything you like. I have defined a name for the start and end up the container, both for rows and columns. Then defined the centre block of the grid as content-start and content-end again, both for columns and rows although you do not need to name all of the lines on your grid. You might choose to name just some key lines for your layout.
trans-unit.target: 在定义网格时，我在方括号内命名线条。这些名称可以是您喜欢的任何名称。我为行和列定义了容器的开始和结束的名称。然后，尽管不需要命名网格上的所有行，但将网格的中心块再次定义为列和行的 content-start 和 content-end 。您可以选择只为布局指定一些关键行。

trans-unit.source: When describing Reference Boxes I explained that the margin-box will clip the shape. You can see this by moving the centre of our circle towards the content by setting the position to 60%. The centre of the circle is now nearer the content and the circle extends past the margin-box. This means that the extension becomes clipped and squared off.
trans-unit.target: 在描述参考框时,我解释了margin-box会夹住形状。你可以通过将位置设置为60%,将圆圈的中心向内容方向移动来看到这一点。现在,圆的中心更接近内容,并且圆延伸过了 margin-box。这意味着,延伸变得剪裁和方块化。

trans-unit.source: When doing this, define the names for your areas outside of any media queries. That way the content area would always be called main no matter where on the grid it is placed.
trans-unit.target: 这样做时，请在任何媒体查询之外定义您所在区域的名称。这样，无论将内容区域放置在网格的哪个位置，都将始终将其称为 main 区域。

trans-unit.source: When drawing 3D graphics, or using a third dimension to layer objects from front to back, the z-coordinate is also used. This specifies the distance away from the viewer if positive and toward the viewer if negative.
trans-unit.target: 在绘制3D图形时，或使用三维尺寸从正面到背面对对象进行分层时，也将使用z坐标。如果为正，则指定远离观察者的距离；如果为负，则指定朝观察者的距离。

trans-unit.source: When in the normal flow, in a block formatting context, boxes are laid vertically one after the other out.
trans-unit.target: 当在正常的流程中,在块状格式化的背景下,方框是一个接一个垂直铺设出来的。

trans-unit.source: When in the normal flow, in an inline formatting context, boxes are laid horizontally one after the other out.
trans-unit.target: 当在正常的流程中,在内联格式化的背景下,方框是一个接一个水平铺设出来的。

trans-unit.source: When laying out a document, the browser's rendering engine represents each element as a rectangular box according to the standard CSS basic box model. CSS determines the size, position, and properties (color, background, border size, etc.) of these boxes.
trans-unit.target: 布局文档时，浏览器的渲染引擎根据标准CSS基本框模型将每个元素表示为一个矩形框。CSS确定这些框的大小，位置和属性（颜色，背景，边框大小等）。

trans-unit.source: When more than one shadow is given, shadows are applied front-to-back, with the first-specified shadow on top.
trans-unit.target: 当给出多个影子时,影子从前到后应用,第一个指定的影子在上面。

trans-unit.source: When multiple elements have been placed into full-screen mode, the backdrop is drawn immediately beneath the frontmost such element, and on top of the older full-screen elements.
trans-unit.target: 当多个元素被放置到全屏模式时,背景会紧贴在最前面的元素下面,并在旧的全屏元素上面绘制。

trans-unit.source: When naming the lines, I mentioned that you can name these anything you like. The name is a custom ident, an author-defined name. When choosing the name you need to avoid words that might appear in the specification and be confusing - such as span. Idents are not quoted.
trans-unit.target: 在命名行时，我提到您可以根据自己的喜好命名。该名称是一个自定义ident，即作者定义的名称。选择名称时，您需要避免在规范中可能出现且容易混淆的单词-例如 span 。没有引用标识。

trans-unit.source: When negative margins are involved, the size of the collapsed margin is the sum of the largest positive margin and the smallest (most negative) negative margin.
trans-unit.target: 当涉及负边距时,塌边距的大小为最大的正边距与最小(最负)的负边距之和。

trans-unit.source: When no intrinsic ratio or dimensions are specified by the source image, rule 4 takes effect, and the image is rendered to fill the background area.
trans-unit.target: 当源图像没有指定固有比例或尺寸时,规则4生效,图像被渲染为填充背景区域。

trans-unit.source: When no value for a non-inherited property has been specified on an element, the element gets the initial value of that property (as specified in the property's summary).
trans-unit.target: 如果未在元素上指定非继承属性的值，则该元素将获取该属性的初始值（如属性摘要中所指定）。

trans-unit.source: When no value for an inherited property has been specified on an element, the element gets the computed value of that property on its parent element. Only the root element of the document gets the initial value given in the property's summary.
trans-unit.target: 在元素上未指定任何继承属性的值时，该元素将在其父元素上获取该属性的计算值。只有文档的根元素会获得属性摘要中给出的初始值。

trans-unit.source: When one value is specified, that one is painted first, followed by the other two in their default order relative to one another. When two values are specified, they will be painted in the order they are specified in, followed by the unspecified one.
trans-unit.target: 当指定一个值时,先画该值,然后按默认的相对顺序画其他两个值。当指定两个值时,将按指定的顺序绘制,然后是未指定的那个值。

trans-unit.source: When printing a page, the browser might want to replace light-colored text on a dark background with dark text on a white background.
trans-unit.target: 打印页面时,浏览器可能希望将深色背景的浅色文本替换为白色背景的深色文本。

trans-unit.source: When properties are left out of some keyframes
trans-unit.target: 当某些关键帧的属性被遗漏时。

trans-unit.source: When property value lists are of different lengths
trans-unit.target: 当属性值列表的长度不同时

trans-unit.source: When range is specified as integers, the value infinite can be used to denote infinity. If infinite is specified as the first value in a range, then it is interpreted as negative infinity. If used as upper bound, it is taken as positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: 如果将range指定为整数，则值 infinite 可用于表示无穷大。如果将无限指定为范围内的第一个值，则将其解释为负无限。如果用作上限，则将其视为正无穷大。

trans-unit.source: When rendering text, the list of OpenType axis names is passed to the text layout engine to enable or disable font features. Each setting is always a <string> of 4 ASCII characters, followed by a <number> indicating the axis value. If the <string> has more or fewer characters or contains characters outside the U+20 - U+7E codepoint range, the whole property is invalid. The <number> can be fractional or negative.
trans-unit.target: 呈现文本时，OpenType轴名称列表将传递到文本布局引擎以启用或禁用字体功能。每个设置始终是4个ASCII字符的 <string> ，后跟 <number> 指示轴值。如果 <string> 具有更多或更少的字符或包含U + 20-U + 7E代码点范围之外的字符，则整个属性无效。所述 <number> 可以是分数或负。

trans-unit.source: When rendering text, the list of OpenType feature tag value is passed to the text layout engine to enable or disable font features. The tag is always a <string> of 4 ASCII characters. If it has more or less characters or contains characters outside the U+20 - U+7E codepoint range, the whole property is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 呈现文本时，OpenType功能标签值的列表将传递到文本布局引擎以启用或禁用字体功能。标记始终是4个ASCII字符的 <string> 。如果它具有或多或少的字符或包含U + 20-U + 7E代码点范围之外的字符，则整个属性无效。

trans-unit.source: When rendering text, the list of variable font axis names is passed to the text layout engine to enable or disable font features. Each setting is always one or more pairs comprised of a <string> of 4 ASCII characters followed by a <number> indicating the axis value to set. If the <string> has more or fewer characters or contains characters outside the U+20 - U+7E codepoint range, the whole property is invalid. The <number> can be fractional or negative, depending on the value range available in your font, as defined by the font designer.
trans-unit.target: 呈现文本时，可变字体轴名称的列表将传递到文本布局引擎，以启用或禁用字体功能。每个设置始终是一对或多对，由4个ASCII字符的 <string> 和后面的 <number> 组成,表示要设置的轴值。如果 <string> 具有更多或更少的字符或包含U + 20-U + 7E代码点范围之外的字符，则整个属性无效。所述 <number> 可以是分数或负，这取决于在字体中可用的值的范围，由字体设计所限定。

trans-unit.source: When scaling the image up, the nearest-neighbor algorithm must be used, so that the image appears to be composed of large pixels. When scaling down, this is the same as auto.
trans-unit.target: 在放大图像时，必须使用最近邻居算法，以便图像看起来由大像素组成。缩小时，这与 auto 相同。

trans-unit.source: When setting multiple line-decoration properties at once, it may be more convenient to use the text-decoration shorthand property instead.
trans-unit.target: 一次设置多个行装饰属性时，改用 text-decoration 速记属性可能更方便。

trans-unit.source: When setting up an explicit grid or defining the sizing for automatically created rows or columns we may want to give tracks a minimum size, but also ensure they expand to fit any content that is added. For example, I may want my rows to never collapse smaller than 100 pixels, but if my content stretches to 300 pixels in height, then I would like the row to stretch to that height.
trans-unit.target: 在设置显式网格或定义自动创建的行或列的大小时,我们可能希望给轨迹一个最小的尺寸,但同时也要确保它们能扩展以适应任何添加的内容。例如,我可能希望我的行永远不会缩小到小于100像素,但如果我的内容延伸到300像素的高度,那么我希望行能延伸到这个高度。

trans-unit.source: When several keyframes are appropriate, it chooses the latest defined in the most important document, but never combined all together.
trans-unit.target: 当几个关键帧合适时,它会选择最重要的文档中最新定义的关键帧,但绝不会把所有的关键帧组合在一起。

trans-unit.source: When specifying the location of a pixel in a graphics context (just like when specifying coordinate systems in algebra), its position is defined relative to a fixed point in the context. This fixed point is called the origin. The position is specified as the number of pixels offset from the origin along each dimension of the context.
trans-unit.target: 当指定像素在图形上下文中的位置时（就像在代数中指定坐标系时一样），其位置是相对于上下文中的固定点定义的。这个固定点称为原点。位置指定为沿上下文的每个维度从原点偏移的像素数。

trans-unit.source: When specifying the size of an item, the Logical Properties and Values specification gives you the ability to indicate sizing as it relates to the flow of text (inline and block) rather than physical sizing which relates to the physical dimensions of horizontal and vertical (e.g. left and right). While these flow relative mappings may well become the default for many of us, in a design you may well use both physical and logical sizing. You might want some features to always relate to the physical dimensions whatever the writing mode.
trans-unit.target: 当指定项目的大小时，逻辑属性和值规范使您能够指示尺寸，因为它与文本流（行内和块）有关，而不是与水平和垂直的物理尺寸有关的物理尺寸（例如左和右）。尽管这些流相对映射很可能成为我们许多人的默认映射，但在设计中，您可能会同时使用物理和逻辑大小。无论书写方式如何，您可能希望某些功能始终与物理尺寸有关。

trans-unit.source: When taking an item out of flow with positioning, you will need to manage the possibility of content overlapping. Out of flow essentially means that the other elements on your page no longer know that element exists so will not respond to it.
trans-unit.target: 当用定位把一个项目带出流程时,你需要管理内容重叠的可能性。出流本质上意味着你页面上的其他元素不再知道该元素的存在,所以不会对其做出响应。

trans-unit.source: When the range descriptor is specified for a counter style, the fallback style will be used to represent values that fall outside the range.
trans-unit.target: 当为计数器样式指定 range 描述符时，后备样式将用于表示超出范围的值。

trans-unit.source: When the -ms-wrap-flow property's computed value is auto, the element does not become an exclusion element unless its float property's computed value is not none. In that case, the element contributes its border box to its containing block's wrapping context and content flows around it according to the clear property. For more information about the impact of an exclusion element on content flow, see the Terminology section of the CSS Exclusions Module Level 1 specification.
trans-unit.target: 当 -ms-wrap-flow 属性的计算值为 auto 时，除非该元素的float属性的计算值不为 none ,否则该元素不会成为排除元素。在这种情况下，元素会将其边框框添加到其包含块的包装上下文中，并且内容将根据 clear 属性围绕其流动。有关排除元素对内容流的影响的更多信息，请参阅CSS排除模块第1级规范的“ 术语”部分。

trans-unit.source: When the fixedsystem is used and there are not enough symbols to cover all the list items, the fallback style will be used for the rest of the list items.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 fixed system 并且没有足够的符号覆盖所有列表项时，后备样式将用于其余列表项。

trans-unit.source: When the system descriptor is cyclic, numeric, alphabetic, symbolic, or fixed, use the symbols descriptor instead of additive-symbols.
trans-unit.target: 当 system 描述符是 cyclic ， numeric ， alphabetic ， symbolic 或 fixed ，请使用 symbols 描述符代替 additive-symbols 。

trans-unit.source: When the browser encounters an invalid var() substitution, the initial or inherited value of the property is used.
trans-unit.target: 当浏览器遇到无效的 var() 替换时，将使用属性的初始值或继承的值。

trans-unit.source: When the document is in full-screen mode, the following CSS applies instead, setting the background color to a pale shade of red.
trans-unit.target: 当文档是在全屏模式下，下面的CSS应用，而不是，设置背景颜色为红色的苍白阴影。

trans-unit.source: When the usage of these alternate glyphs is activated, if one character in the run doesn't have such a typographically-enhanced glyph, the whole set of characters of the run is rendered using a fallback method, synthesizing these glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 当这些备用字形的使用被激活时,如果运行中的一个字符没有这样的排版增强字形,则运行中的整组字符将使用回退方法,合成这些字形。

trans-unit.source: When the visual viewport of this scroll container is scrolled horizontally, it must ignore snap points.

trans-unit.target: 滚动此滚动容器的可视视口时，它必须忽略捕捉点。

trans-unit.source: When there is more content than can fit into a container, an overflow situation occurs. Understanding how overflow behaves is important in dealing with any element with a constrained size in CSS. This guide explains how overflow works when working with normal flow.
trans-unit.target: 当有更多的内容可以容纳到一个容器中时,就会出现溢出的情况。理解溢出的行为方式对于处理CSS中任何尺寸受限的元素是很重要的。本指南解释了在使用正常流程时,溢出是如何工作的。

trans-unit.source: When using an angle, 0deg creates a vertical gradient running bottom to top, 90deg creates a horizontal gradient running left to right, and so on in a clockwise direction. Negative angles run in the counterclockwise direction.
trans-unit.target: 使用角度时， 0deg 会创建从下到上的垂直渐变， 90deg 会创建从左到右的水平渐变，依此类推。负角沿逆时针方向延伸。

trans-unit.source: When using an image with no intrinsic dimensions but an intrinsic ratio, things work similarly.
trans-unit.target: 当使用一个没有内在尺寸但有内在比例的图像时,情况也是如此。

trans-unit.source: When using both properties together you may get fewer columns than specified in the value for column-count.
trans-unit.target: 同时使用这两个属性时，您获得的列可能少于 column-count 的值中指定的列。

trans-unit.source: When using one or two unitless values, flex-basis changes from auto to 0. More information can be found in the draft for the Flexible Box Layout Module.
trans-unit.target: 当使用一个或两个无单位值时，伸缩基础将从自动更改为0。更多信息可在“ 柔性箱布局模块”的草稿中找到。

trans-unit.source: When using scrollbar-color property with specific color values, authors should ensure the specified colors have enough contrast between them. For keyword values, UAs should ensure the colors they use have enough contrast. See Techniques for WCAG 2.0: G183: Using a contrast ratio of 3:1.
trans-unit.target: 当使用具有特定颜色值的scrollbar-color属性时，作者应确保指定的颜色之间具有足够的对比度。对于关键字值，UA应确保它们使用的颜色具有足够的对比度。请参阅WCAG 2.0技术：G183：使用3：1的对比度。

trans-unit.source: When using the box alignment properties you will align content on one of two axes — the inline (or main) axis, and the block (or cross) axis. The inline axis is the axis along which words in a sentence flow in the writing mode being used — for English, for example, the inline axis is horizontal. The block axis is the axis along which blocks, such as paragraph elements, are laid out and it runs across the Inline axis.
trans-unit.target: 使用框对齐属性时，将在两个轴之一（内联（或主轴）轴和块（或交叉）轴）上对齐内容。内联轴是在使用写作模式的句子中单词沿其流动的轴，例如对于英语，内联轴是水平的。块轴是放置诸如段落元素之类的块并沿Inline轴延伸的轴。

trans-unit.source: When we describe flexbox as being one dimensional we are describing the fact that flexbox deals with layout in one dimension at a time — either as a row or as a column. This can be contrasted with the two-dimensional model of CSS Grid Layout, which controls columns and rows together.
trans-unit.target: 当我们将flexbox描述为一维时，我们所描述的事实是flexbox一次处理一个维度中的布局-无论是行还是列。这可以与CSS Grid Layout的二维模型形成对照，后者可以同时控制列和行。

trans-unit.source: When we have a set of items that we want to display horizontally, we may well end up with additional space. We need to decide what to do with that space, and have a couple of options. We either display the space outside of the items — therefore spacing them out with white space between or around them — or we absorb the extra space inside the items and therefore need a method of allowing the items to grow and take up this space.
trans-unit.target: 当我们有一组要水平显示的项目时，最终可能会有更多空间。我们需要决定如何处理该空间，并有两个选择。我们要么显示项目外部的空间（因此将它们之间或周围的空白隔开），要么吸收项目内部的多余空间，因此需要一种允许项目增长并占用该空间的方法。

trans-unit.source: When we specify our grid area using the grid-area property we first define both start lines block-start and inline-start, then both end lines block-end and inline-end. This seems unusual at first as we are used to the physical properties of top, right, bottom and left but makes more sense if you start to think of websites as being multi-directional in writing mode.
trans-unit.target: 当我们使用 grid-area 属性指定网格区域时，我们首先定义了start line block-start 和 inline-start ，然后定义了end line block-end 和 inline-end 。乍一看，这似乎很不寻常，因为我们习惯了顶部，右侧，底部和左侧的物理属性，但是如果您开始认为网站在写作模式下是多方向的，那就更有意义了。

trans-unit.source: When working with a site in a writing mode other than a horizontal, top to bottom one, or when using writing modes for creative reasons, being able to relate to the flow of the content makes a lot of sense.
trans-unit.target: 当以横向的、从上到下的写作模式以外的写作模式来处理网站时,或者出于创作的需要而使用写作模式时,能够联系到内容的流程是非常有意义的。

trans-unit.source: When working with flexbox you need to think in terms of two axes — the main axis and the cross axis. The main axis is defined by the flex-direction property, and the cross axis runs perpendicular to it. Everything we do with flexbox refers back to these axes, so it is worth understanding how they work from the outset.
trans-unit.target: 使用flexbox时，您需要考虑两个轴-主轴和交叉轴。主轴由 flex-direction 属性定义，而横轴垂直于其延伸。我们对flexbox所做的一切都涉及这些轴，因此值得一开始就了解它们的工作方式。

trans-unit.source: When working with grid layout you have two axes available to align things against – the block axis and the inline axis. The block axis is the axis upon which blocks are laid out in block layout. If you have two paragraphs on your page they display one below the other, so it is this direction we describe as the block axis.
trans-unit.target: 使用网格布局时，有两个轴可用于对齐东西- 块轴和内联轴。块轴是按块布局在其上布置块的轴。如果页面上有两个段落，它们将在另一个段落的下方显示，因此我们将此方向称为块轴。

trans-unit.source: When wrapping flex items, the need to space them out is likely to arise. At the current time we do not have any implementations of the gap properties from the Box Alignment module for Flexbox. In the future we will be able to simply use row-gap and column-gap for flexbox as we do for CSS Grid. At the current time you will need to use margins to achieve this.
trans-unit.target: 包装弹性物品时，可能需要将它们隔开。目前，我们没有Flexbox 的“ 框对齐”模块中的间隙属性的任何实现。将来，我们将能够像对CSS Grid一样简单地对flexbox 使用 row-gap 和 column-gap 。目前，您将需要使用边距来实现此目的。

trans-unit.source: When you do anything to remove, or shift an item from where it would be placed in normal flow, you can expect to need to do some managing of the content and the content around it to prevent overlaps. Whether that involves clearing floats, or ensuring that an element with position: absolute does not sit on top of some other content. For this reason methods which remove elements from being in-flow should be used with understanding of the effect that they have.
trans-unit.target: 当您进行任何操作以从正常流程中将其删除或将其移出时，您可能需要对内容及其周围的内容进行一些管理，以防止重叠。无论是清除浮点数，还是确保具有 position: absolute 的元素都不会位于其他内容之上。因此，应在了解其影响的情况下使用从流入中除去元素的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you set an item to display: none in order to hide it, the item is removed from the formatting structure of the page. What this means in practice is that counters ignore it, and things like transitions do not run. Using visibility: hidden keeps the box in the formatting structure which is useful in that it still behaves as if it were part of the layout even though the user can’t see it.
trans-unit.target: 当您设置要 display: none 的项目：无以隐藏它时，该项目将从页面的格式结构中删除。实际上，这意味着计数器会忽略它，并且诸如转换之类的事情不会运行。使用 visibility: hidden 将框保留在格式结构中，这很有用，因为即使用户看不到它，它的行为也仍然像布局的一部分一样。

trans-unit.source: When you specify an invalid cubic-bezier curve, CSS ignores the whole property.
trans-unit.target: 当您指定无效的 cubic-bezier 曲线时，CSS会忽略整个属性。

trans-unit.source: Where the flex-grow property deals with adding space in the main axis, the flex-shrink property controls how it is taken away. If we do not have enough space in the container to lay out our items and flex-shrink is set to a positive integer the item can become smaller than the flex-basis. As with flex-grow different values can be assigned in order to cause one item to shrink faster than others — an item with a higher value set for flex-shrink will shrink faster than its siblings that have lower values.
trans-unit.target: 当 flex-grow 与主轴线增加空间的房地产交易中， flex-shrink 属性控制它是如何带走。如果容器中没有足够的空间来布置商品，并且 flex-shrink 设置为正整数，则商品可能会比 flex-basis 小。与 flex-grow 一样，可以分配不同的值以使一个项目比其他项目更快地收缩-为 flex-shrink 设置较高的值的项目将比其具有较低值的同级项目更快地收缩。

trans-unit.source: Whether a given page is "left" or "right" is determined by the major writing direction of the document. For example, if the first page has a major writing direction of left-to-right then it will be a :right page; if it has a major writing direction of right-to-left then it will be a :left page.
trans-unit.target: 给定页面是“左”还是“右”取决于文档的主要书写方向。例如，如果第一页的主要书写方向是从左到右，则它将是 :right 页；如果主要写作方向是从右到左，那么它将是 :left 页面。

trans-unit.source: Whether a given page is "left" or "right" is determined by the major writing direction of the document. For example, if the first page has a major writing direction of left-to-right then it will be a :right page; if it has a major writing direction of right-to-left then it will be a :left page.
trans-unit.target: 给定页面是“左”还是“右”取决于文档的主要书写方向。例如，如果第一页的主要书写方向是从左到右，则它将是 :right 页；如果主要写作方向是从右到左，那么它将是 :left 页面。

trans-unit.source: Whether the box establishes a local stacking context.
trans-unit.target: 盒子是否建立了本地的堆积上下文。

trans-unit.source: Whether you are in continuous media on the web or in a Paged Media format such as print or EPUB, understanding how content overflows is useful when dealing with any layout method. By understanding how overflow works in normal flow, you should find it easier to understand the implications of overflow content in layout methods such as grid and flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 无论你是在网络上的连续媒体中,还是在印刷品或EPUB等Paged Media格式中,了解内容如何溢出在处理任何布局方法时都是有用的。通过了解溢出在正常流程中是如何工作的,你应该会发现更容易理解溢出内容在网格和flexbox等布局方法中的影响。

trans-unit.source: Whether you use flexbox or CSS Grid to lay out a list of card components, these layout methods only work on direct children of the flex or grid component. This means that if you have variable amounts of content, the card will stretch to the height of the grid area or flex container. Any content inside uses regular block layout, meaning that on a card with less content the footer will rise up to the bottom of the content rather than stick to the bottom of the card.
trans-unit.target: 无论你是使用flexbox还是CSS Grid来布局卡片组件列表,这些布局方法都只适用于flex或网格组件的直接子代。这意味着,如果你的内容数量可变,卡片将拉伸到网格区域或flex容器的高度。里面的任何内容都使用常规的块状布局,这意味着在内容较少的卡片上,页脚会上升到内容的底部,而不是粘在卡片的底部。

trans-unit.source: While I’ve spent some time in this guide going through potential issues and fallbacks, flexbox is very much ready for you to be using in production work. This guide will help you in those cases where you do come across an issue or have the requirement to support older browsers.
trans-unit.target: 尽管我在本指南中花了一些时间来解决潜在的问题和后备问题，但是flexbox非常适合您在生产工作中使用。本指南将在遇到问题或需要支持较旧的浏览器的情况下为您提供帮助。

trans-unit.source: While certain languages will use a particular writing mode or text direction, we can also use these properties for creative effect, such as running a heading vertically.
trans-unit.target: 虽然某些语言会使用特定的写作模式或文本方向,但我们也可以使用这些属性来实现创造性的效果,例如垂直运行一个标题。

trans-unit.source: While exploring the above patterns you have hopefully started to see how you can think through the best way to use flexbox to achieve the result that you want. Quite often you have more than one choice. Mix items that cannot stretch with those that can, use the content to inform the size, or allow flexbox to share out space in proportion. It’s up to you.
trans-unit.target: 在探索以上模式时，您希望已经开始了解如何使用Flexbox最佳方法来实现所需的结果。通常，您有多种选择。将无法拉伸的项目与可以拉伸的项目混合在一起，使用内容来告知尺寸，或者允许flexbox按比例分配空间。由你决定。

trans-unit.source: While flexbox is a one dimensional model, it is possible to cause our flex items to wrap onto multiple lines. In doing so, you should consider each line as a new flex container. Any space distribution will happen across that line, without reference to the lines either side.
trans-unit.target: 虽然flexbox是一个一维模型,但也可以使我们的flex项目包覆到多条线上。在这样做的时候,你应该把每一条线都看作是一个新的弹性容器。任何空间分布都会发生在这条线上,而不需要参考两边的线。

trans-unit.source: While it is usually subtle, defined in the specification is one reason why flex-shrink isn’t quite the same for negative space as flex-grow is for positive space:
trans-unit.target: 尽管它通常很微妙，但在规范中定义的原因是负空间的 flex-shrink 与正空间的 flex-grow 不太相同的原因之一：
